snippet: Eric LeGrand, the former Rutgers player who was paralyzed in a game against Army in 2010, was part of the coin toss for the Buccaneers before they played the Giants on Sunday.
abstract: Eric LeGrand, the former Rutgers player who was paralyzed in a game against Army in 2010, was part of the coin toss for the Buccaneers before they played the Giants on Sunday.

headline.main: LeGrand,  'Buc for Life,' Receives Warm Ovation Before Giants-Bucs Game
